name: Penguin Slide (Axellelot)
description:
Penguin Slide, is a game about a penguin sliding through the ice to get food for his family !

Controls are very simple :

Z/Q/S/D to move,

Space to jump

There is also a controller support !

Use the left stick to move, and the A button to jump 

Tips and tricks :

In this game, you need to catch as many fish as you can, and reach the end of the level.

when you jump, you gain speed, so the more you jump, the more you get speed, and you will be able to reach the others platforms !

This game was made by 5 students from eartsup Montpellier.

Arthur Piqueras : 3D modelization, animation, shader graph, trailer

Axelle Perrot : 3D modelization, shader graph, UI, concept art, texture

Mathys Mechain: Programation, organization

Nicolas Schrepel: level design, animation, 3D modelization, skybox, shadergraph

Sébastien Mateo: level design, Integration, MAP, texture artist
